data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stekolnikov, Alexandr A., Saboori, Alireza, Shamsi, Mohsen, Hakimitabar, Masoud (2019): Chigger mites (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) of Iran. Zootaxa 4549 (1): 1-66, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4549.1.1|468 occurrences
